page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In Northfield area of Birmingham Employment is good, but there is still unemployment in this area though. The main employment areas are Longbridge Leyland, Wesleyshire also there is Kalamazoo and small shops examples Wool -worths, Burtons and also Sainsburys. In the town centre most buisnesses and shops have local employee's and not many people live outside the Northfield area that work in these buisnesses. Most people who work at British Leyland, Wesleyhire come from the Northfield regions examples Longbridge, Kings Norton etc. These works are main industries for these areas. Leyland and Wesleyshire have companies widely spread over britian, these companies produce cars and car parts for Austin Morris and Austin Rover also Wesleyshire is a cleaning company for Leyland. f
